sense.gloss: ogre-like person (i.e. fierce, relentless, merciless, etc.)
it (in a game of tag, hide-and-seek, etc.)
x: 鬼ごっこ・おにごっこ

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は|お↑兄↑↓に|い↓さんにそっくりだよ。
sdata.e: You look just like your big brother.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑君↑↓きみ↓の|お↑兄↑↓に|い↓さんかの、どちらかが↑間違↑↓まちが↓っている。
sdata.e: Either you or your brother is wrong.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑英語↑↓えいご↓ができれば↑鬼↑↓|おに|↓に↑金棒↑↓かなぼう↓なんだが。
sdata.e: If you could only speak English, you would be perfect.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がここにいてくれるなら、なにも↑怖↑↓こわ↓いものなし。↑鬼↑↓|おに|↓に↑金棒↑↓かなぼう↓だよ。
sdata.e: With you here beside me I'm not afraid of anything. You're my fortress.

sdata.j: ↑強↑↓つよ↓い↑東風↑↓こち↓が↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑顔↑↓か|お↓に|↑激↑↓はげ↓しく↑吹↑↓ふ↓き↑付↑↓つ↓けた。
sdata.e: The strong east wind lashed at our faces.

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓|おに|↓の↑留守↑↓るす↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓。
sdata.e: When the cat is away, the mice will play.

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓|おに|↓の↑居↑↓い↓ぬ↑間↑↓ま↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓。
sdata.e: When the cat is away, the mice will play.

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓|おに|↓の↑目↑↓め↓にも↑涙↑↓なみだ↓。
sdata.e: Even the hard-hearted can be moved to tears.
Fortune is the rod of the weak, and the staff of the brave.

sdata.j: ↑鬼↑↓|おに|↓が↑出↑↓で↓るか↑蛇↑↓じゃ↓が↑出↑↓で↓るか。この↑提案↑↓ていあん↓↑書↑↓しょ↓の↑結果↑↓けっか↓が↑見物↑↓みもの↓だね。
sdata.e: There's no telling what kind of trouble this proposal might stir up. The result is certainly going to be something to see.
